author: swagata87
body:
#### PR description:
Adapt `FixedGridRhoProducerFastjetFromRecHit.cc` to use HCal noise cuts from GT. 
This producer is used only in HLT and was introduced before the start of Run3 (via https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36157) to move away from caloTowers. The HCal noise cuts were previously provided from HLT config. Now it is made GT-based. Although, we still keep the option open to use cuts from config file. If this is deemed unnecessary, we can remove the option and allow only GT-based approach.

Related PRs which are doing similar migrations: 
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43025 for `RecoParticleFlow`
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43164 for `RecoEgamma`

#### PR validation:
Tested with some Run3 WFs.
title: Migrate RecHit-based rho producer to use HCal noise cuts from GT
